resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104782</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104782</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205285</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">What's Growing in That Dish?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was wächst in diesem Teller?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Que se développe dans ce plat ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que está crescendo nesse prato?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa sta sviluppandosi in quel piatto?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποια ανάπτυξη σε εκείνο το πιάτο;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Qué está creciendo en ese plato?</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, students will view the clips of the video discussing the discovery of penicillin and the scientific discovery process. They will then run their own open-ended experiments to see how body molds and bacteria respond to variable substances.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion sehen die Kursteilnehmer die Clips des 
Bildschirmes die Entdeckung des Penicillins und des wissenschaftlichen
Entdeckungprozesses behandelnd an. Sie lassen dann ihre eigenen 
offenen Experimente laufen, um zu sehen, wie Körper formt und 
Bakterium auf variable Substanzen reagiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants visualiseront les clips 
du vidéo discutant la découverte de la pénicilline et du procédé 
scientifique de découverte. Ils exécuteront alors leurs 
propres expériences ouvertes pour voir comment le corps moule et les 
bactéries répondent aux substances variables.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, os estudantes verão os grampos do vídeo 
que discutem a descoberta do penicillin e do processo científico da 
descoberta. Funcionarão então suas próprias experiências 
open-ended para ver como o corpo molda e as bactérias respondem às 
substâncias variáveis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, gli allievi osserveranno le clip del 
video che discutono la scoperta di penicillina e del processo 
scientifico di scoperta. Allora faranno funzionare i loro propri
esperimenti espandibili per vedere come il corpo modella ed i batteri 
rispondono alle sostanze variabili.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι σπουδαστές θα εμφανίσουν τους 
συνδετήρες του βίντεο συζητώντας την ανακάλυψη της πενικιλίνης 
και της επιστημονικής διαδικασίας ανακαλύψεων. Θα τρέξουν 
έπειτα τα απέραντα πειράματά τους για να δουν πώς οι 
φόρμες και τα βακτηρίδια σωμάτων αποκρίνονται στις μεταβλητές 
ουσίες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección, los estudiantes opinión los clips del 
vídeo que discuten el descubrimiento de la penicilina y del proceso 
científico del descubrimiento. Entonces ejecutarán sus propios
experimentos ampliables para ver cómo el cuerpo moldea y las 
bacterias responden a las sustancias variables.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205285</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104782</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    <item>
      <location>

  </manifestation>
